answer:
The rubella vaccine is combined with the measles and mumps vaccine (the MMR vaccine).  You can get the MMR vaccine for free from your local public health unit.  Some pharmacies will also have the free vaccine. Women should avoid becoming pregnant for 1 month after getting the MMR vaccine. 
- Immunization Nurse
answer_formatted:
## The rubella vaccine is combined with the measles and mumps vaccine (the MMR vaccine).


## You can get the MMR vaccine for free from your local public health unit.

Some pharmacies will also have the free vaccine.
Women should avoid becoming pregnant for 1 month after getting the MMR vaccine.
- Immunization Nurse
question: I am 25 yrs old. My doctor advised me to get Rubella Vaccine before I plan to get pregnant. Where can I go to get Rubella Vaccine for free of cost in Surrey BC.
question_variation_0: can i get rubella vaccination before pregnant
question_variation_1: can rubella vaccine be used before a pregnancy
question_variation_2: does rubella vaccine need to be given prior to conception
